attributes.action: Disband and abolish the House of Lords with immediate effect.
attributes.additional_details: There is no need or use for more than 800 non-elected old people to exercise any influence over our lives or the political life of Britain.
attributes.background: The House of Lords needs to be assigned to history and no longer play any role in British politics.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300395
